> "Good" saidJhiaxus" Go to Crs and after that come to see me...
> i want to know your report"
>
> Jhiaxus moved towards the CR and started the reparation process

Skorponok continued on his way towards Hydras' base, tunneling just beneath a rather large ridge that ran along the ocean floor. He was about half way to his destination.

Inside Cyclonus and Rodimus stared at each other with expressions that moved in complex hues ranging from anger to respect. Scourge for his part looked at the forward screens, then Hydras, then at Zarak, his face showing irritation and mistrust. His optics darkened dangerously, but he never left his strapped in position at his chair. 

TAG/TBC

Preston

OOC: I am purposefully stretching this out slightly, only because there is so much distance to travel, including underneath the ocean floor. I wasn't aware of how far it was previously. They will be arriving in the next post or two. 

If Megatron wants to follow them, I am not sure of his sensors, but perhaps he will see a long line of heat??  The heat trail is the tunnel that they left behind that the Magma filled. While it only goes for a couple of miles before it begins to cool into obscurity, it points to a subsurface tunnel aimed in a straight line in the direction of Hydras' base.
